review: I had some issues with it working and had to unplug my Dish in order for it to work. Kept saying signal not strong enough though wireless bridge right next to it and 4 bars out of 5 in strength. I did watch a whole movie from Prime list with no problem except it did not fill my whole plasma screen. Haven't tried since because when I switched back to Dish my whole screen was pink background. Had to turn everything off and do full reset on Dish system. I am using an HDMI switch since my Plasma only has one.Only other item of note is you don't know how to work somethings and troubleshoot unless its working since system relies on video tutorials. Little pamphlet doesn't help much.
